016package de.cuioss.test.jsf.util;
017
018import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
019
020import java.util.ArrayList;
021import java.util.Collection;
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.Set;
024
025import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.ApplicationConfigurator;
026import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.BeanConfigurator;
027import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.ComponentConfigurator;
028import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.JsfTestConfiguration;
029import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.JsfTestContextConfigurator;
030import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.RequestConfigurator;
031import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.decorator.ApplicationConfigDecorator;
032import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.decorator.BeanConfigDecorator;
033import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.decorator.ComponentConfigDecorator;
034import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.decorator.RequestConfigDecorator;
035import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.objects.impl.DefaultInstantiator;
036import de.cuioss.tools.collect.CollectionBuilder;
037import de.cuioss.tools.reflect.MoreReflection;
038import lombok.AccessLevel;
039import lombok.NoArgsConstructor;
040
041/**
042 * Helper class providing some utility methods for handling configuration.
043 *
044 * @author Oliver Wolff
045 */
046@SuppressWarnings("squid:S1118") // owolff: lombok generated
047@NoArgsConstructor(access = AccessLevel.PRIVATE)
048public final class ConfigurationHelper {
049
050    /**
051     * Checks the given type for the annotation {@link JsfTestConfiguration} and and
052     * puts all found in the immutable {@link Set} to be returned
053     *
054     * @param annotated the class that may or may not provide the annotations, must
055     *                  not be null
056     * @return immutable {@link Set} of found {@link JsfTestConfiguration} elements.
057     */
058    public static Set<JsfTestConfiguration> extractJsfTestConfiguration(final Class<?> annotated) {
059        requireNonNull(annotated);
060
061        final var builder = new CollectionBuilder<JsfTestConfiguration>();
062
063        MoreReflection.extractAllAnnotations(annotated, JsfTestConfiguration.class).forEach(builder::add);
064
065        return builder.toImmutableSet();
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * Instantiates the given {@link ComponentConfigurator} and calls them with the
070     * given {@link ComponentConfigDecorator}. In case the given testClass instance
071     * also implements {@link ComponentConfigurator} the corresponding method will
072     * be called <em>after</em> the others
073     *
074     * @param testClass      the actual instance of test, must not be null
075     * @param registry       to be passed the the individual instances of
076     *                       {@link ComponentConfigurator}, must not be null
077     * @param configurations the previously extracted annotations, must not be null
078     *                       but may be empty.
079     */
080    public static void configureComponents(final Object testClass, final ComponentConfigDecorator registry,
081            final Collection<JsfTestConfiguration> configurations) {
082        requireNonNull(testClass);
083        requireNonNull(registry);
084        requireNonNull(configurations);
085        final List<ComponentConfigurator> instances = getAssignableContextConfigurators(configurations,
086                ComponentConfigurator.class);
087        if (testClass instanceof ComponentConfigurator configurator) {
088            instances.add(configurator);
089        }
090        instances.forEach(instance -> instance.configureComponents(registry));
091    }
092
093    /**
094     * Instantiates the given {@link BeanConfigurator} and calls them with the given
095     * {@link BeanConfigDecorator}. In case the given testClass instance also
096     * implements {@link BeanConfigurator} the corresponding method will be called
097     * <em>after</em> the others
098     *
099     * @param testClass      the actual instance of test, must not be null
100     * @param registry       to be passed the the individual instances of
101     *                       {@link BeanConfigurator}, must not be null
102     * @param configurations the previously extracted annotations, must not be null
103     *                       but may be empty.
104     */
105    public static void configureManagedBeans(final Object testClass, final BeanConfigDecorator registry,
106            final Collection<JsfTestConfiguration> configurations) {
107        requireNonNull(testClass);
108        requireNonNull(registry);
109        requireNonNull(configurations);
110        final List<BeanConfigurator> instances = getAssignableContextConfigurators(configurations,
111                BeanConfigurator.class);
112        if (testClass instanceof BeanConfigurator configurator) {
113            instances.add(configurator);
114        }
115        instances.forEach(instance -> instance.configureBeans(registry));
116    }
117
118    /**
119     * Instantiates the given {@link ApplicationConfigurator} and calls them with
120     * the given {@link ApplicationConfigDecorator}. In case the given testClass
121     * instance also implements {@link ApplicationConfigurator} the corresponding
122     * method will be called <em>after</em> the others
123     *
124     * @param testClass      the actual instance of test, must not be null
125     * @param registry       to be passed the the individual instances of
126     *                       {@link ApplicationConfigurator}, must not be null
127     * @param configurations the previously extracted annotations, must not be null
128     *                       but may be empty.
129     */
130    public static void configureApplication(final Object testClass, final ApplicationConfigDecorator registry,
131            final Collection<JsfTestConfiguration> configurations) {
132        requireNonNull(testClass);
133        requireNonNull(registry);
134        requireNonNull(configurations);
135        final List<ApplicationConfigurator> instances = getAssignableContextConfigurators(configurations,
136                ApplicationConfigurator.class);
137        if (testClass instanceof ApplicationConfigurator configurator) {
138            instances.add(configurator);
139        }
140        instances.forEach(instance -> instance.configureApplication(registry));
141    }
142
143    /**
144     * Instantiates the given {@link RequestConfigurator} and calls them with the
145     * given {@link RequestConfigDecorator}. In case the given testClass instance
146     * also implements {@link RequestConfigurator} the corresponding method will be
147     * called <em>after</em> the others
148     *
149     * @param testClass      the actual instance of test, must not be null
150     * @param registry       to be passed the the individual instances of
151     *                       {@link RequestConfigurator}, must not be null
152     * @param configurations the previously extracted annotations, must not be null
153     *                       but may be empty.
154     */
155    public static void configureRequestConfig(final Object testClass, final RequestConfigDecorator registry,
156            final Collection<JsfTestConfiguration> configurations) {
157        requireNonNull(testClass);
158        requireNonNull(registry);
159        requireNonNull(configurations);
160        final List<RequestConfigurator> instances = getAssignableContextConfigurators(configurations,
161                RequestConfigurator.class);
162        if (testClass instanceof RequestConfigurator configurator) {
163            instances.add(configurator);
164        }
165        instances.forEach(instance -> instance.configureRequest(registry));
166    }
167
168    /**
169     * @param configurations all configurators
170     * @param configurator   class to check if assignable
171     * @param <T>            target type
172     * @return list of {@link JsfTestContextConfigurator} with target type
173     */
174    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
175    private static <T extends JsfTestContextConfigurator> List<T> getAssignableContextConfigurators(
176            final Collection<JsfTestConfiguration> configurations, final Class<T> configurator) {
177        final List<T> instances = new ArrayList<>();
178        for (final JsfTestConfiguration config : configurations) {
179            for (final Class<? extends JsfTestContextConfigurator> type : config.value()) {
180                if (configurator.isAssignableFrom(type)) {
181                    instances.add((T) new DefaultInstantiator<>(type).newInstance());
182                }
183            }
184        }
185        return instances;
186    }
187}
